mapper.insert: INSERT INTO backing (backer_id, project_id, reward_id, backing_amount, status, create_time) VALUES (#{backerId}, #{projectId}, #{rewardId}, #{backingAmount}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM backing WHERE id = #{id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT b.id, b.backing_amount, b.status, b.create_time, p.id AS projectId, p.title AS projectTitle, pr.id AS rewardId, pr.title AS rewardTitle FROM backing b LEFT JOIN project p ON b.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN project_reward pr ON b.reward_id = pr.id WHERE b.backer_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.create_time DESC
